title: Update Stops at 33% with unexpected error- help
body:
here is the info from netalyzer
--

thank you for any help!

I have the logs from the client if those would help as well.

replies.body: I snipped out your link as it usually tends to have sensitive info.  At 33% the patcher needs to connect to the patching servers to download updates, but a network problem can block that.  Your first step should be to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EzctolnM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-08T18:34:39.099+0000)
>
> I snipped out your link as it usually tends to have sensitive info.  At 33% the patcher needs to connect to the patching servers to download updates, but a network problem can block that.  Your first step should be to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions.

if I give you my logs from the Hextech Repair Tool would that help? I've tried everything in the connection issues guide and am still having problems

For sure!  Since the guide didn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help individually.  Attach the HRT logs as well as the analyzer for more context.  We'll get back to you asap!
